content.p: Assistant Professor, Admissions Tutor, Faculty of Social Sciences I was born in Perak, which is a state in the northern regions of Malaysia, about 3 hours' drive from Kuala Lumpur. I have always had a great interest in the English Language, even at a very young age. My exposure to the language began rather early and has remained an important aspect of my personal and professional life. I am very interested in innovative and creative methods in Language Teaching, specifically the use of elements such as drama or any form of the creative arts in teaching language. I strongly believe that creative use of these elements in a language class can enhance student performance and interest in learning, specifically in an English for Academic Purposes environment.
